snippet: The ninth annual trek drew a number of tourists, though part of its appeal, said one traveler, is that only a true child of the city would be interested.
abstract: Ninth annual walking tour, organized and run by New Yorker Andy Maskin, takes participants on a 13-mile trek from Union Square to John F Kennedy International Airport; intention is to offer both tourists and city residents alike the opportunity to see New York neighborhoods they would not normally experience up close.
lead_paragraph: The ninth annual trek drew a number of tourists, though part of its appeal, said one traveler, is that only a true child of the city would be interested.

headline.seo: Unscenic Walking Tour Goes From Lower Manhattan to J.F.K.
headline.main: An Unscenic Urban Walk: From Lower Manhattan to Kennedy Airport
headline.print_headline: An Unscenic Urban Walk: From Lower Manhattan to Kennedy Airport
